title: Alliance of Evil - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/19/18
itunes:title: Alliance of Evil - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/19/18
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett and retired Army Lt. Colonel Robert Maginnis explore the possibility of a new Cold War with Russia and China, and whether the violence could spill over to the Middle East and fulfill a Biblical prophesy of world war.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
